name: SITER
body:
### Welcome to SITER.
Modern business is done online. We build businesses and help with promotion, optimisation and monetisation of websites. Social media, SEO and Analytics are not just buzzwords - they're our tools for getting things done. 

### Team
Siter is run by **Andrei Railean**, who has a strong background as both a developer and a manager of online businesses. With plenty of experience in website construction, promotion and monetisation as well as extensive network of contacts in Australian online circles, Andrei can provide valuable input to many businesses of small and medium size.

* [Andrei Railean on LinedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/andreirailean)
* [Personal Website](http://www.andrei.md)

### Support or Contact
Need to get in touch? Contact [info@siter.com.au](mailto:info@siter.com.au) or call Andrei 0412 854406
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
